licence_overview:
To accumulate and dispose of radioactive wastes you need an authorisation from the [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)"){:rel="external"}

*[SEPA]: Scottish Environment Protection Agency
licence_short_description: To accumulate and dispose of radioactive wastes you need an authorisation from the Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).
overview: To accumulate and dispose of radioactive wastes you need an authorisation from the Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)
title: Authorisation to accumulate and dispose of radioactive waste (Scotland)
